articles.title: Biden Falls Off Bike During Visit to Rehoboth Beach
articles.description: The president did not need medical attention after he fell off his bike at a state park near his vacation home in Rehoboth Beach, according to the White House.
articles.content:
REHOBOTH BEACH, Del. President Biden fell off his bike on Saturday while trying to dismount in front of a small crowd of reporters and onlookers.

articles.title: Yellowstone River flooding is a 1 in 500-year event, US Geological Survey says
articles.description: The devastating flooding that occurred along the Yellowstone River this week constitutes a 1 in 500 year event, according to a US Geological Survey news release.

articles.title: Florida Allows Doctors to Order Covid Vaccines for Young Children
